caption.p: Simulated superposition of the structures of SARS-CoV-2 3CL pro (PDB code: 6LU7, blue), SARS-CoV 3CL pro (PDB code: 1Q2W, red), and MERS-CoV 3CL pro (PDB code: 4RSP, green). (For interpretation of the references to colour in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the Web version of this article.)
